meanings.definition: To create a subclass of a class in object-oriented programming.
meanings.sent1: I am subclassing the main class to make a new one.
meanings.sent2: Programmers often use subclassing to extend the functionality of existing classes.
meanings.sent3: The computer was feeling creative, so it started subclassing its programming.
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, subclassing is like creating a new species from an existing one.
meanings.sent5: Subclassing allows developers to customize and specialize their code.

meanings.definition: The act of forming a subclass.
meanings.sent1: The subclassing of the class was necessary for the project.
meanings.sent2: Understanding subclassing is crucial for object-oriented programming.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was 'subclassing', where everyone dressed as a variation of a main character.
meanings.sent4: In the family tree of programming, subclassing is like a new branch growing.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of subclassing lies in its ability to create tailored solutions.

meanings.sent1: The subclassing was a success, and the new object worked perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The subclassing added new features to the existing entity.
meanings.sent3: The art exhibit showcased a masterpiece of subclassing, blending old and new elements.
meanings.sent4: The garden gnome, after subclassing, became a gnome wizard with a magical staff.
meanings.sent5: The world of programming is full of subclassing possibilities for innovative creations.
